item.description:
Opening it up for anyone else who is interested.  For more information, please see the following:

http://www.oplusracemanagement.com/pdfs/12guiness.pdf

We'll meet up roughly an hour or two ahead of time, and meet up at the Old Warren Marina after the race is finished.

Registration is $22, or $25 at the race.  Online registration is available at the following:

http://www.active.com/running/warren-ri/finish-for-a-guiness-5k-road-race-2012

Your shirt and number, I assume, you can pick up prior to or on the day of the race.

Any questions, comments and/or concerns, please don't hesitate to ask.  Should be a fun day of running.  If you have anything to add, please don't hesitate to comment.
item.name: Finish for a Guinness 5K
